fields.name: IgnoreCase
fields.description: Setting this parameter to truth value with force the pattern to do a case in-sensitive comparison.

fields.name: Negate
fields.description: Setting this value as truth will force to check the negation of the condition given by the user.

fields.name: Pattern
fields.description: The pattern, either fixed string or regular expression, that evaluates the truthfulness of the condition.

fields.name: Variable
fields.description: The condition parameter of the RewriteRuleCondition.
